mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_term_agre_detl.select */ SELECT guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ ,term_div_cd /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,term_ver /* term_ver 약관_버전 numeric */ ,term_agre_yn /* term_agre_yn 약관_동의_여부 character(1) */ ,term_agre_dttm /* term_agre_dttm 약관_동의_일시 character(14) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tm_term_agre_detl WHERE 1 = 1 AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ AND term_div_cd = #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ AND term_ver = #{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_term_agre_detl.insert */ INSERT INTO tm_term_agre_detl ( guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ ,term_div_cd /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,term_ver /* term_ver 약관_버전 numeric */ ,term_agre_yn /* term_agre_yn 약관_동의_여부 character(1) */
,term_agre_dttm /* term_agre_dttm 약관_동의_일시 character(14) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ #{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 numeric */ ,#{termAgreYn} /* term_agre_yn 약관_동의_여부 character(1) */
,#{termAgreDttm} /* term_agre_dttm 약관_동의_일시 character(14) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_term_agre_detl.update */ UPDATE tm_term_agre_detl
,term_agre_yn = #{termAgreYn} /* term_agre_yn 약관_동의_여부 character(1) */
,term_agre_dttm = #{termAgreDttm} /* term_agre_dttm 약관_동의_일시 character(14) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ AND term_div_cd = #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ AND term_ver = #{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 numeric */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_term_agre_detl.merge */ INSERT INTO tm_term_agre_detl ( guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ term_div_cd /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ term_ver /* term_ver 약관_버전 numeric */ ,term_agre_yn /* term_agre_yn 약관_동의_여부 character(1) */
,term_agre_dttm /* term_agre_dttm 약관_동의_일시 character(14) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ #{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 numeric */ ,#{termAgreYn} /* term_agre_yn 약관_동의_여부 character(1) */
,#{termAgreDttm} /* term_agre_dttm 약관_동의_일시 character(14) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,term_agre_yn = #{termAgreYn} /* term_agre_yn 약관_동의_여부 character(1) */
,term_agre_dttm = #{termAgreDttm} /* term_agre_dttm 약관_동의_일시 character(14) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_term_agre_detl.delete */ DELETE FROM tm_term_agre_detl WHERE 1 = 1 AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ AND term_div_cd = #{termDivCd} /* term_div_cd 약관_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ AND term_ver = #{termVer} /* term_ver 약관_버전 numeric */
